title: update --merge fails without giving a clear message (conflicts in .gitmodules) why
body:
ATM if I have added a new subdataset locally, update --merge fails without giving any suggestive error message 

```shell
(git)hopa:~/datalad[master]git
$> git merge --abort
(dev) 2 12008.....................................:Wed 17 May 2017 12:57:28 PM EDT:.
(git)hopa:~/datalad[master]git
$> datalad update --merge; datalad search -r title 'zebra finch'
[INFO   ] Updating dataset '/home/yoh/datalad' ... 
[INFO   ] Merging updates... 
[ERROR  ] Cmd('/usr/lib/git-annex.linux/git') failed due to: exit code(1)
|   cmdline: /usr/lib/git-annex.linux/git -c receive.autogc=0 -c gc.auto=0 pull -v origin master [cmd.py:wait:291] (GitCommandError) 
crcns/aa-1: Single-unit recordings from two auditory areas in male zebra finches
crcns/aa-2: Single-unit recordings from multiple auditory areas in male zebra finches
crcns/aa-3: Behavioral and electrophysiological studies of the avian thalamic song nucleus Uvaeformis including multiunit recordings in awake, behaving birds and song recordings from adult birds pre- and post-lesion of Uva.
crcns/am-1: Development of a birdsong motor circuit with antidromically-identified neurons: Spontaneous spiking data from anesthetized juvenile and adult zebra finch HVC.
crcns/am-3: Single-unit extracellular recordings of projection neurons in the premotor cortical area HVC of juvenile male zebra finches during singing.
changes on filesystem:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
 .gitmodules | Unmerged
 .gitmodules | 6 ++++++
 crcns       | 2 +-
 dbic        | 2 +-
 indi        | 2 +-
 labs        | 2 +-
cached/staged changes:
 .datalad/meta/crcns/meta.json  | 2256 +++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++---
 .datalad/meta/dbic/meta.json   |   38 +-
 .datalad/meta/dicoms/meta.json |    4 +-
 .datalad/meta/hbnssi/meta.json |   81 ++
 .datalad/meta/indi/meta.json   |  996 +++++++++++++-----
 .datalad/meta/labs/meta.json   |  107 +-
 .gitmodules                    | Unmerged
 crcns                          |    2 +-
 dbic                           |    2 +-
 dicoms                         |    2 +-
and few more
(dev) 2 12009.....................................:Wed 17 May 2017 12:57:30 PM EDT:.
(git)hopa:~/datalad[master]git
$> datalad --version
datalad 0.5.1.dev412
```
